useCase.name: Publish Dataset Package

preconditions.precondition: The Publisher is logged in via GitHub or Google.

successEndConditions.condition: The dataset package is successfully published to the team.

useCase.trigger: User initiates the data package creation process.

mainSequence.step: Publisher logs in via GitHub or Google.
User Account Management authenticates the login successfully.
Publisher initiates the data package creation.
Dataset Publishing sets package visibility to private.
Access Control verifies team access rights.
Dataset Publishing saves the dataset package.
Dataset Publishing publishes the package to the team.
